effect_entries.effect: Give to a scientist in a museum to receive a []{pokemon:archen}.

flavor_text_entries.text:
とりポケモンの　祖先と　いわれる
古代ポケモンの　カセキ。
つばさの　一部らしい。

A fossil from a prehistoric Pokémon
that once lived in the sky. It looks as
if it could come from part of its wing.

Fossile di un Pokémon preistorico che solcava
i cieli. Sembra essere parte della sua ala.

Aumenta la probabilidad de asestar un golpe
crítico. Al cambiar de Pokémon, el efecto
desaparece.

Das Fossil eines uralten Pokémon, von dem man
annimmt, dass es der Urahn der Vogel-Pokémon
sei. Es handelt sich um einen Teil des Flügels.

Le fossile d’un ancien Pokémon volant.
Il semble que ce soit un morceau d’aile.

새포켓몬의 조상이라 불리는
고대 포켓몬의 화석.
날개의 일부인 듯하다.

とりポケモンの　そせんと　いわれる
こだい　ポケモンの　カセキ。
つばさの　いちぶ　らしい。

A fossil of an ancient Pokémon that
flew in the sky in ancient times.
It appears to be part of its wing.

A fossil of an ancient Pokémon that
flew in the sky in ancient times.
It appears to be part of its wing.

Fossile d’un ancien Pokémon
volant. Il semble que ce soit
un morceau d’aile.
